resources.string: We will play top trumps. I will show you your cards. Read the statistics on each one. Note the statistics for age, goals, trophies, height and caps but do not read them out. When I tell you to pick a card, pick one card and one statistic only. After a card is picked it cannot be picked again. I will then show my card and if my statistic is higher I win, if it is lower you win.
